#!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby -wKU
require 'jcode' require ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH'] + '/lib/textmate'
begin # Split document into lines. Get current line number minus one for # previous, minus another for ruby being 0 based. lines = STDIN.readlines line = ENV['TM_LINE_NUMBER'].to_i - 2
# Get length of previous line, using jlength for unicode length = lines[line].rstrip.jlength
# Print same number of = length.times { print "=" } rescue TextMate.exit_show_tool_tip("Use this command on the line following a string to turn it into setext-style heading.") end
